tail.name: abdomen
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A chitinous, oval-shaped roach-like abdomen sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldBrownDark(roach-like abdomen)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE Chitinous, oval-shaped roach-like abdomens sprout from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until they're about [npc.tailLength] long.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldBrownDark(roach-like abdomens)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] roach abdomen, which fits gracefully aside [npc.her] torso. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] roach abdomens, which fit gracefully aside [npc.her] torso. #ENDIF
